metadata.title: CVE-2021-4221 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
If a domain name contained a RTL character, it would cause the domain to berendered to the right of the path. This could lead to user confusion andspoofing attacks.
*This bug only affects Firefox for Android. Otheroperating systems are unaffected.*
*Note*: Due to a clerical error thisadvisory was not included in the original announcement, and was added inFeburary 2022. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 92.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
